name: DefCry
description: Defcy is a platformer game meant to ruin people's day. It was built with rage in mind so take caution playing this game. This game is a platformer game inspired a tad by Celeste but mostly around challenge. Players must run around a cave as a stickman. He has a grapple and insane stamina.  It's a bit of a challenge game with a lot of rage in it. Players must run around a cave as a stickman.
